testcase.classname: Pick Mistake Without Write Textarea Note-Before BPKB
testcase.name: Assign User to Contract BPKB
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Contract Dispatcher Admin"...........................passed And Select Menu "Management Assignment".....................................passed And Select Username "mobile.test" of Management Assignment..................passed And Check for username if already assigned to "BPKB"........................passed And Wait page for load......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.classname: Pick Mistake Without Write Textarea Note-Before BPKB
testcase.name: Select Menu Contract Dispatcher and Select Contract based on type contract BPKB
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Menu "Contract Dispatcher".......................................passed And Select Contract Number based on Type Contract "BPKB"....................passed And Click button "Claim"....................................................passed And Varify the mistake detail already match with the matrix Base on Type Contract.passed And Checkbox General Mistake "01. BPKB bagian depan tidak ada"..............passed And Choose Dropdown mistake type "Dokumen diunggah tidak ada" from mistake name "BPKB bagian depan tidak ada".passed And Click button "Save".....................................................passed And Get text from pop up "IT Supporting Tools" with text "Note-before cannot be empty".passed And Click button "OK".......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Comment "Register Mistake failed because Note-before empty".............passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
